name: Kpop Trainee
description:
This is a game where you can play as a new trainee in fictional kpop entertainment company.  Features lots of kpop tunes, dance practices, and good friends.

Windows:

  1. Download Kpop Trainee Win v2.zip
  2. Extract contents
  3. Run "Game"

Mac:

  1. Download Kpop Trainee Mac v2.zip
  2. Move to Applications
  3. Unzip
  4. Run "Game"
